programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: The Mystery Of The Cyclops: Experts investigate whether an advanced civilisation of giants built Malta's mysterious megaliths. Could they have had extraterrestrial help? (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: Weird Or What? With William Shatner
programme.desc: Weird Animal Behaviour: Three extraordinary stories about the supersensory power of animals, including a psychic octopus that correctly predicted multiple World Cup winners. (S3, ep 5)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind The Deal
programme.desc: Fire Bomb: Go behind the scenes and discover how the Golds really feel when a customer tries to rip off the store. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Giants of Malta: Could the megalithic structures of Malta - and an underground complex housing otherworldly remains - be linked to local legends of alien visitation. (S15, ep 10)

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: The Top Ten Pyramid Sites: Count down the world's top ten pyramid sites, from hidden structures in Peru to the famous landmarks of Giza in Egypt. (S15, ep 11)

programme.desc: Join antiques expert and presenter David Dickinson as more collectors try to sell their items to dealers. Will they strike a deal or take a chance at auction instead? (S8, ep 16)

programme.title: Storage Wars Texas
programme.desc: Hoarder Patrol: The buyers compete with huge crowds in Hallsville, where Mary and Moe go all out on a locker they know will make Moe's wife angry. (S4, ep 10)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Close Encounters of the Pawn Kind: Chum sets his sights on something out of this world when a seller brings in a signed copy of The Coming of the Saucers.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Fool's Gold: Les causes drama when he tells a woman her gold bracelet is fake. Later, it's Seth's turn to suss whether a gold watch is priceless or worthless. (S2, ep 7)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Cash Kings: An out-of-character Les makes an impulse decision that threatens to backfire, and later gives a big loan to a customer with a dubious sob story. Has he been fleeced? (S2, ep 8)

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind The Deal
programme.desc: To Catch a Thief: Part 1: Discover what the Golds really think about one of the most infamous episodes ever. When jewellery is found scattered, Les knows something is afoot. (S1, ep 10)

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens

programme.title: Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There

programme.title: Secrets In The Ice
programme.desc: The Vanishing of Flight CS-59: From a secret underground military facility in Greenland to a grisly collection of human remains in the Andes, explore more secrets in the ice. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Storage Hunters

programme.desc: Crash Training Course: Grizzy finds a gadget that enables you to learn anything. He can now become the perfect bear! But first, he needs to learn how to get rid of the Lemmings. (S1 Ep54)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dial B for Birder: Harold uncovers a secret plot that Chef's new parrot is hatching and tries to save his teacher, only to discover that Sugar figured it out before him. Or did she? (S3 Ep16)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: A Hole Lot of Trouble: When rain derails an outside game of catch, someone suggests they play inside. This prompts Izzy to lead the group through her wildly imaginative worst case scenario. (S3 Ep17)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: Practice Makes Perfect: The Mermicornos try to level up their powers in a magical training shell, but Astra's obsession with perfection puts them all in danger. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Unicorn Academy
programme.desc: The Vision Pool: Eager to decode the message from the Whispering Willows, Sophia skips party planning to visit the Vision Pool, after promising Ava she wouldn't. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Smart Cookie: Yana eats a cookie to level up her smarts, but realises it's her heart that makes her special. (S1 Ep45)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Disappearing Act: Miguel learns a new trick, which gets him completely lost. (S1 Ep46)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Oozing Talent: When Sugar unwittingly wins a job as spokesperson for a diarrhoea medication, she enlists the help of her friends to stop the commercial from premiering during the big game. (S3 Ep46)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Senior Sinisters: Harold concocts an anti-age cream for Chef, but when it turns the kids old Chef decides to hide the reversal cream - taking care of old people is making him young again! (S3 Ep47)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Be Claws I Love You, Shelley: When Owen brings a lobster in for show and tell, we discover that Chef has a real lobster problem. (S3 Ep48)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Total Trauma Rama: Duncan, normally the bad kid, has an identity crisis when his pranks start curing people of their fears. (S3 Ep49)

programme.title: Mermicorno: Starfall
programme.desc: When You Squish upon a Star: Squishella's given the opportunity to become the pop star she's always dreamt of being, but fame comes at a cost. (S1 Ep106)

programme.title: Unicorn Academy
programme.desc: The Broken Gem: The Sapphires try everything to prevent Sophia and Ava from fighting, but they've got bigger problems: two dastardly henchmen are after the grimstone. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Catlantic City: Felicity brings Miguel to Catlantic City, where Miguel is locked up in the pound for being a dog. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty
programme.desc: Scaredy Cat: Felicity, Miguel, Yana and Athena have to cross Phobia Forest to cash in coupons for free cupcakes. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Total Eclipse Of The Fart: After accidentally swallowing her first loose tooth and fearing that means no cash under the pillow, Leshawna tries to capture the tooth fairy. (S2 Ep16)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dissing Cousins - Part 1: It's International Cousins Day and Owen and Gwen are dreading the fact that their cousins Max and Ella are spending the day with them. (S2 Ep17)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dissing Cousins - Part 1: It's International Cousins Day and Owen and Gwen are dreading the fact that their cousins Max and Ella are spending the day with them. (S2 Ep18)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: For A Few Duncans More: While using Chef's fancy new copier, Duncan accidentally makes an entire other Duncan. Great! But things go badly when the other Duncan decides to copy himself too. (S2 Ep19)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: He Who Wears The Clown: After trying on the nose of a clown, Owen learns that this is how clowns are made. He's stuck as a clown until he can trick someone into asking to try on the nose. (S2 Ep20)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Us 'r' Toys: Chef brings in some old toys from his childhood and he, Duncan and Gwen get magically sucked into the toys and need to find a way to get back into their own bodies. (S2 Ep21)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Dream Worriers: Izzy forgets the ending to her most amazing dream of all time, so the kids travel into her mind to find out what happened. (S2 Ep22)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Grody To The Maximum: Cody gets a super cool new t-shirt. It's so cool that the kids don't even recognise him, so Cody jumps on the chance to leave his old life behind and become popular. (S2 Ep23)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Wiggin' Out: Bridgette donates her hair to a charity that makes wigs for hairless cats and now some classmates want to do the same. (S2 Ep24)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: The Upside Of Hunger: Owen has a mishap while baking an upside-down cake and is transported to an upside-down world where he is forced to outwit himself in order to get his cake back. (S2 Ep25)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Fire In The Hole: Duncan cooks up a nuclear hot sauce to mess with Chef, but accidentally summons Terry Spice, King of the Underworld! (S2 Ep26)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Tu Ba Or Not Tu Ba: The class tries to help Chef achieve his dream of joining the world's most famous Tuba Band, Tubalicious, only to regret it when they realise how much they'll miss him. (S2 Ep27)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Teacher, Soldier, Chef, Spy: When Beth, Duncan and Izzy break Chef's new VR helmet they have to recreate his game world to keep him from ever finding out the truth. (S3 Ep22)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Thingameroo: When a lack of motivation threatens to sink the kids' chances in the Sportslete Athlaction Awards, they create the greatest mascot of all time to boost school spirit. (S3 Ep23)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: CodE.T.: When Cody gets sick, the kids want to send a message back to his home planet in the hope that they can save him, but Courtney is not in favour of the plan. (S3 Ep24)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Aches & Ladders: When MacArthur has a bad fall in the school, the kids' recollections of the event are just as weird as they are. (S3 Ep37)

programme.title: Total Dramarama
programme.desc: Cactus Makes Perfect: Cody's friends become concerned when he forms a new friendship with a cactus. (S3 Ep38)

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: Things That Go Bump In The Night: While Axel is staying up all night with friends Zoe and Luka, Madcap and his henchmen break into the house. The big baddy has developed his own Power Bandz! (S1 Ep54)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Piata Party: Grizzy finds a birthday piata in the ranger's living room. (S1 Ep70)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Game: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a magical Game of the Goose. The events displayed in the squares that the players land on come true in real life. (S1 Ep71)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Ranger Lemming: Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. (S1 Ep72)

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Cyfres animeiddiedig i blant yn dilyn anturiaethau Tib, Lalw a Bobl. An animated series for children following the adventures of Tib, Lalw and Bobl.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Abel wrthi'n adeiladu pyramid o jariau jam yn ofalus ac mae gm Digbi a Conyn bron 'u dymchwel. Digbi and Conyn's game nearly topples Abel's half-built pyramid of jam-jars.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: 'Ble mae'r mynydd uchaf?' Mae Tad-cu'n adrodd stori am Goronwy Gwych, Planed Craig Fach a Chystadleuaeth Adeiladu Mynydd Rhyng-Galactig! Today, Hari asks where is the highest mountain?

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae Gerwyn yn gwch hen iawn, iawn ac mae'n gwybod pob math o bethau. Yn anffodus, heddiw mae'r cychod eraill yn anwybyddu ei gyngor call. The boats ignore Gerwyn's useful advice.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back, with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: New: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn clywed llais o grombil twnnel creigiog. Maen nhw'n ymchwilio a'n dysgu bo synau'n gallu bownsio! The Woohoos hear a voice coming from inside a rocky tunnel and investigate!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Mario'n ceisio ei orau glas i gasglu cnau cyll ond mae gan y wiwer syniadau ei hun. Mario's efforts to forage for hazelnuts are thwarted by a mischievous squirrel.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Sam Tn a'i ffrindiau yn y pentre'. The adventures of Sam Tn and friends in the village.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae'r Octonots yn dod ar draws llyffaint dart gwenwynig ar l i eger llanw peryglus daro'r Amason. The Octonauts find out about poison dart frogs after a tidal bore sweeps up the Amazon.

programme.title: New: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Mae ymbarel Tanwen, cyflwynydd y tywydd, wedi torri. Mae hi'n gwneud apl yn fyw ar y teledu ac aiff Harri ac Alex i'w helpu. Tanwen, the weather forecaster's umbrella has broken. Help!

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae'n ddiwrnod golchi, ond does dim golwg o'r Glaw! Tybed a all Fwffa Cwmwl helpu'r Cymylaubychain i orffen y golch? It's washing day but where's Rain? Can the little clouds do the washing?

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Pan mae Betsi yn bwrw swyn ac yn gwneud i Siriol ddiflannu ar ddamwain, mae Glenys yn cipio Llyfr Swyn. Betsi casts a spell and Glenys takes her chance and grabs Spellbook in the chaos.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Wedi clywed stori am ddraig goch a draig wen gan ei Mam-gu mae Martha eisiau mynd i ben Yr Wyddfa i weld os yw'r mynydd yn gartref i ddreigiau. Is Yr Wyddfa really where dragons call home?

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae'r Abadas yn chwarae morladron yn chwilota am drysor a chaiff un lwcus gyfle i chwilio am rywbeth arall - gair. The Abadas are pirates, hunting for treasure and looking for an 'anchor'.

programme.title: Sbarc

programme.title: Y Tralalas

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido

programme.title: Joni Jet

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd

programme.title: Y Pitws Bychain

programme.title: Jambori

programme.title: The Snows of Kilimanjaro
programme.desc: 1952. Romance. Directed by Henry King & Roy Ward Baker. Stars Gregory Peck & Susan Hayward. A writer reflects on his life as he lies dying from an infection while on safari near Mount Kilimanjaro. [S]

programme.title: Ramrod
programme.desc: 1947. Western. Connie Dickson (Veronica Lake) plans to marry a sheep rancher, but her father teams up with land baron Frank Ivey to drive the man out of town. [S]

programme.title: The Hand
programme.desc: 1960. Horror. Stars Derek Bond & Bryan Coleman. In WW2, British soldiers are captured by the Japanese and have their hands removed. Years later, someone is removing the hands of people in London. [S]

programme.title: Beyond The Truth
programme.desc: Impact Earth. An investigation into the threat to Earth of a collision with a large meteorite. (S1, E02)

programme.title: Dangerous Assignment
programme.desc: The Perfect Alibi. 1952. Stars Brian Donlevy, Virginia Christine & Byron Kane. A political informer's murder in Rome leads to the discovery that an unfamiliar opportunist is impersonating Steve. [S]

programme.title: Not So Dusty
programme.desc: 1956. Comedy directed by Maclean Rogers. Two dustmen (Bill Owen and Leslie Dwyer) come into possession of a valuable book but the donor's sister wants it back. Also starring Joy Nichols. [S]

programme.title: Unknown World
programme.desc: 1951. Sci-fi. Directed by Terry O. Morse. Stars Bruce Kellogg & Otto Waldis. A group of scientists travel to the centre of the Earth to seek a habitable space in the event of a nuclear war. [S]

programme.title: Murder in Eden
programme.desc: 1961. Thriller. Director: Max Varnel. Stars: Ray McAnally, Catherine Feller, Yvonne Buckingham. After discovering a famous painting is a forgery, a noted art critic is killed by driver. [S]

programme.title: Pit of Darkness
programme.desc: 1961. Crime drama. A partner of a safe making firm is found unconscious on a bomb site. A large safe his company installed has been robbed. Starring William Franklyn and Nigel Green. [S]

programme.title: Alice in Wonderland
programme.desc: 1966. Fantasy. Directed by Jonathan Miller. Stars Anne-Marie Mallik, Peter Sellers & Wilfrid Brambell. Young girl Alice falls down a rabbit hole into a bizarre world full of eccentric characters. [S]

programme.title: Cinebox Memories
programme.desc: Enjoy an excellent performance from the fabulous Dionne Warwick as she sings the 60s tune Walk On By.

programme.title: Adventures of Robinson Crusoe
programme.desc: 1954. Adventure. Directed by Luis Bunuel. Stars Dan O'Herlihy, Jaime Fernndez & Felipe de Alba. The classical story of Robinson Crusoe, a man who is stranded on a desert island after a shipwreck. [S]

programme.title: The Happiest Days of Your Life
programme.desc: 1950. Comedy. Directed by Frank Launder. Stars Alastair Sim, Margaret Rutherford & John Turnbull. Chaos ensues for staff and students when an all-boys and an all-girls school are merged into one. [S]

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre
programme.desc: Number Six. 1962. Directed by Robert Tronson. Stars Ivan Desny, Nadja Regin & Joyce Blair. Charles Valentine discovers that he is being followed by a secret agent from Scotland Yard. [S]

programme.title: Colonel March of Scotland Yard
programme.desc: Passage at Arms. 1956. Stars Boris Karloff, Ewan Roberts. A French fencing match provides the telling clue in a murder and Inspector Goron travels to London to assist March. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Minstrel's Shakedown. 1966. Stars Adam West, Van Johnson & Leslie Perkins. A new villain called The Minstrel throws the Gotham Stock Exchange into chaos, sending the market into near disaster. [S]

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: Missing Person. 1958. Stars Robert Beatty, Barbara Steele & Vera Day. Maguire must adopt unusual tactics when the bodies of three girls are found in the Thames, with no obvious reason why. [S]

programme.title: Rumpole of the Bailey
programme.desc: Rumpole and the Family Pride. Stars: Leo McKern, Marion Mathie, Abigail McKern. Rumpole defends his cousin after an old lady drowns on his estate.

programme.title: Love for Lydia
programme.desc: Episode 11. 1977. Stars Mel Martin, Christopher Blake & Sherrie Hewson. Now in London, Richardson tries to bring his life together without Lydia. Lydia begins to sink into a life of partying. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro prepares us for a night of evil spirits and a trip to a horrifying asylum. First, is the 1989 supernatural horror Amityville: The Evil Escapes, written and directed by Sandor Stern. [S]

programme.title: Amityville: The Evil Escapes

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline presents the next terrifying tale of the night, the 1978 psychological thriller The Fifth Floor, about a disco dancer who is mistakenly sent to an asylum and fights to prove her sanity. [S]

programme.title: The Fifth Floor
programme.desc: 1978. Thriller. Directed by Howard Avedis. Stars Bo Hopkins, Dianne Hull & Patti D'Arbanville. A college disco dancer is wrongly committed to an asylum where horrors lurk along every corridor. [S]

programme.title: The Fifth Floor
programme.desc: 1978. Thriller. Directed by Howard Avedis. Stars Bo Hopkins, Dianne Hull & Patti D'Arbanville. A college disco dancer is wrongly committed to an asylum where horrors lurk along every corridor. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Lights out! Caroline Munro is ready to close up for the night, but not before giving us a glance at next week's night of 80s horror. [S]

programme.title: The Giant Gila Monster
programme.desc: 1959. Sci-Fi. Directed by Ray Kellogg. Starring Don Sullivan, Fred Graham & Lisa Simone. A giant lizard terrorises a small town. Can the police and a hot rod gang stop the monster? [S]

programme.title: Soho Conspiracy
programme.desc: 1950. Drama. Restaurant owners' daughter Dora (Zena Marshall) and press agent Guy (John Witty) plan a concert to restore a bombed church, but their plans are thwarted by a lawyer who has other plans.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: No Place Like Home. 1962. Stars Donna Douglas, Bea Benaderet & Frank Wilcox. Back home for Christmas, Elly May bonds with her old animal friends, while Pearl tries to impress Mr. Brewster. [S]

programme.title: Stagecoach West
programme.desc: High Lonesome. Western starring Wayne Rogers, Richard Eyer & Robert Bray. Simon Kane drubs his supervisor Osgood for revealing that Kane's wife deserted him and his son. [S]

programme.title: Danger By My Side
programme.desc: 1963. Crime. Stars Anthony Oliver, Maureen Connell, Bill Nagy. With the help of the Met police a girl tracks down the killers of her detective brother. [S]

programme.title: Blind Date
programme.desc: 1959. Thriller. Directed by Joseph Losey. Starring Hardy Kruger, Stanley Baker & Micheline Presle. The mistress of a struggling artist is killed and Inspector Morgan investigates a complex case. [S]

programme.title: The Pickwick Papers
programme.desc: 1952. Comedy. In this British classic, the Pickwick Club send a group to find interesting things around England. Stars James Hayter, Nigel Patrick, Kathleen Harrison & Harry Fowler. [S]

programme.title: A Hill in Korea
programme.desc: 1956. War. Directed by Julian Amyes. Stars George Baker, Stanley Baker & Michael Caine in his first credited film role. In the Korean war, British soldiers try to fight their way back to safety. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers

programme.title: My Outlaw Brother

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: The Man Hater. 1959. Stars Rory Calhoun, Lori Nelson & William Tannen. Bill attempts to help a young woman who is fleeing from a gunfighter, but she's become bitter towards all men. [S]

programme.title: The Woman in Green
